author: Daniel Greene
description:
Let’s talk about what might just be the greatest YA epic fantasy ever written—Garth Nix’s Old Kingdom trilogy. With necromancers, Charter magic, and one of the most unique fantasy worlds ever crafted, Sabriel, Lirael, and Abhorsen deserve way more recognition.
